mapper.sql: a.id AS id, a.company_name AS companyName, a.login_name AS loginName, a.password AS password, a.user_name AS userName, a.email AS email, a.phone AS phone, a.mobile AS mobile, a.qq_num AS qqNum, a.wx_num AS wxNum, a.beg_date AS begDate, a.end_date AS endDate, a.status AS status, a.create_by AS createBy, a.create_date AS createDate, a.update_by AS updateBy, a.update_date AS updateDate, a.remarks AS remarks, a.del_flag AS delFlag, a.tenant_id AS tenantId
